structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
COUNTY EMPLOYEES' CIVIL SERVICE AND RETIREMENT

law.history: Repealed 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 116, sec. 78. -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 4. -- Created 1958 Ky. Acts ch. 167, sec. 25.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Death after retirement -- Refund of contributions.
